channel.title: I need help on how to make a weapon do a 1 hit ko
channel.description: OK HOW DO I MAKE ANY WEAPON RING OR STUFF LIKE THAT HIT A 1 HIT KO?

item.title: I need help on how to make a weapon do a 1 hit ko
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

Obfuscate them too, don’t want someone stealing it.

Read full topic

item.source: I need help on how to make a weapon do a 1 hit ko

item.title: I need help on how to make a weapon do a 1 hit ko
item.dc:creator: @xx_robie_xx xx robie xx
item.description:
@xx_robie_xx wrote:

1.open up item.cfg

2.look for the item you want to hit 1 hit k0

3.example:

item = 15334 Bandos_Godsword A_brutally_heavy_sword. 30000 80000000 30000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8

4.the numbers 30000 80000000 30000 means the price,low alch, high alch. so ignore those

5.the number 132 mean the strenght bonus…change it higher, the higer, the more it hits…

  1. Compile then run and it should work.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help on how to make a weapon do a 1 hit ko

item.title: I need help on how to make a weapon do a 1 hit ko
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You may also need to put a return statement in there somewhere.
I’m unfamiliar with the contents of the method.

The reason I think this will be needed is because you may still inflict damage before or after your target is killed.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help on how to make a weapon do a 1 hit ko

item.title: I need help on how to make a weapon do a 1 hit ko
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:10, topic:218473”]ohemgee.
if(playerWeapon == ) target.applyDead();[/quote]
LMFAO I WAS WAITING FOR SOMEONE TO TELL HIM OFF…

Hint: target is the client object you are attacking and this all should go in the method called when you attack someone… enjoy.

Read full topic
